animeTitle: Sinbad: Soratobu Hime to Himitsu no Shima
otherNames: Sindbad: The Flying Princess and the Secret Island, シンドバッド 空とぶ姫と秘密の島
synopsis:
Sinbad dreams of voyaging to an unknown world. He and his pet monkey Mimi encounter Sana, a girl riding a flying wooden horse. Then, the wind shifts.

(Source: ANN, edited)
